issue.title: Cmake config does not seem correct when using components without a core library

content.raw:
I've open a PR on [ign-tools](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-tools/pull-requests/10/) that addresses this issue.

Admittedly this is an edge case that I didn't specifically plan for, but I think the solution given in that PR is a reasonable one. It creates and exports an "interface" library target for the core of ignition-tools.

That interface library target doesn't really do anything except act as a cmake artifact that allows the rest of `ignition-cmake`'s machinery to work the way that's intended.
